at.mroland.objectstaterecovery

Class TransientMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.mroland.objectstaterecovery.TransientMemory

  • public class TransientMemory
extends Object
    Basic implementation of storage transient memory of JCRE

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransientMemory

        public TransientMemory(PersistentMemory memoryManager)

    • Method Detail

      • makeBooleanArray

        public boolean[] makeBooleanArray(short length,
                         byte event)
        Creates a transient boolean array with the specified array length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the boolean array
        event - the CLEAR_ON... event which causes the array elements to be cleared
        Returns:
        the new transient boolean array
        Throws:
        NegativeArraySizeException - if the length parameter is negative
        SystemException - with the following reason codes:
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_VALUE if event is not a valid event code.
        • SystemException.NO_TRANSIENT_SPACE if sufficient transient space is not available.
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_TRANSIENT if the current applet context is not the currently selected applet context and CLEAR_ON_DESELECT is specified.

      • makeByteArray

        public byte[] makeByteArray(short length,
                   byte event)
        Creates a transient byte array with the specified array length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the byte array
        event - the CLEAR_ON... event which causes the array elements to be cleared
        Returns:
        the new transient byte array
        Throws:
        NegativeArraySizeException - if the length parameter is negative
        SystemException - with the following reason codes:
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_VALUE if event is not a valid event code.
        • SystemException.NO_TRANSIENT_SPACE if sufficient transient space is not available.
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_TRANSIENT if the current applet context is not the currently selected applet context and CLEAR_ON_DESELECT is specified.

      • makeShortArray

        public short[] makeShortArray(short length,
                     byte event)
        Creates a transient short array with the specified array length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the short array
        event - the CLEAR_ON... event which causes the array elements to be cleared
        Returns:
        the new transient short array
        Throws:
        NegativeArraySizeException - if the length parameter is negative
        SystemException - with the following reason codes:
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_VALUE if event is not a valid event code.
        • SystemException.NO_TRANSIENT_SPACE if sufficient transient space is not available.
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_TRANSIENT if the current applet context is not the currently selected applet context and CLEAR_ON_DESELECT is specified.

      • makeObjectArray

        public Object[] makeObjectArray(short length,
                       byte event)
        Creates a transient array of Object with the specified array length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the Object array
        event - the CLEAR_ON... event which causes the array elements to be cleared
        Returns:
        the new transient Object array
        Throws:
        NegativeArraySizeException - if the length parameter is negative
        SystemException - with the following reason codes:
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_VALUE if event is not a valid event code.
        • SystemException.NO_TRANSIENT_SPACE if sufficient transient space is not available.
        • SystemException.ILLEGAL_TRANSIENT if the current applet context is not the currently selected applet context and CLEAR_ON_DESELECT is specified.

      • isTransient

        public byte isTransient(Object theObj)
        Checks if the specified object is transient.

        Note:

          This method returns NOT_A_TRANSIENT_OBJECT if the specified object is null or is not an array type.
        Parameters:
        theObj - the object being queried
        Returns:
        NOT_A_TRANSIENT_OBJECT, CLEAR_ON_RESET, or CLEAR_ON_DESELECT
        See Also:
        makeBooleanArray(short, byte), makeByteArray(short, byte), makeObjectArray(short, byte), makeShortArray(short, byte)

      • getAvailableMemory

        public short getAvailableMemory(byte event)
        Get the number of bytes available in transient memory of given type.
        Parameters:
        event - transient memory type (CLEAR_ON_RESET/CLEAR_ON_DESELECT)
        Returns:
        number of bytes available in transient memory of given type, or Short.MAX_VALUE if number of bytes exceeds Short.MAX_VALUE

      • clear

        public void clear(byte event)
        Clear data of transient objects depending on event type.
        Parameters:
        event - event type (CLEAR_ON_RESET/CLEAR_ON_DESELECT)

      • deleteContextSegments

        public void deleteContextSegments(AID contextAID)
        Delete transient memory segment of a given context.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset transient object storage.

      • serializeToXml

        public void serializeToXml(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlSerializer xml)
        Serialize persistent memory to XML.
        Parameters:
        xml - XmlSerializer instance used as target for serialization.

      • deserializeFromXml

        public void deserializeFromXml(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser xml)
        De-serialize persistent memory from XML.
        Parameters:
        xml - XmlPullParser instance used as source for de-serialization.
